{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.23917v1", "title": "A construction of curvature-adapted hypersurfaces in the product of
  symmetric spaces", "summary": "In this paper, we give a construction of curvature-adapted hypersurfaces in
the product $G_1/K_1\times G_2/K_2$ of (Riemannian) symmetric spaces $G_i/K_i$
($i=1,2$). By this construction, we obtain many examples of curvature-adapted
hypersurfaces in $G_1/K_1\times G_2/K_2$. Also, we calculate the eigenvalues of
the shape operator and the normal Jacobi operator of the curvature-adapted
hypersurfaces obtained by this construction.", "main_category": "math.DG", "categories": "math.DG", "published": "2025-03-31T10:08:02Z"}
